name: The Guy and the Pie
description:
You are a guy.  You wear a tie.  You want to eat pie.

In this point-and-click adventure game, you must:
-Overcome being late to a work friend's birthday celebration!
-Deal with a possibly superhuman janitor who wants to eat your pie!
-Handle the cyclical nature of pie!

You can also:
-Interact with a lot of objects.  Some are there just for fun!

Thus...
Will you eat the pie?  Will the pie eat you?  Find out by playing The Guy and the Pie!

The latest version of this game's executable is downloable HERE on Google Drive, and the latest built version with source code is downloadable HERE on GitHub!

Did you Know?
This game is inspired by Monte Cook's The Orc and the Pie, the World's Shortest yet Technically Complete Adventure!

Extra Spoilers!
The script for the game's first 3 rooms/levels is HERE so you can understand where we're going with this game!  And, yes, SPOILERS ABOUND!
